title: NBA on NBC — Studio 1 Stamford

gallery.caption: Floor-to-ceiling LED bands wrapping the studio
30 etched glass NBA team logo panels

summary: After 22 years in the wilderness, basketball comes home — and brings a half-court with it. Mystic delivered scenic fabrication for NBC Sports' flagship return to NBA coverage.
challenge: When NBC Sports secured NBA broadcast rights for 2025-26, it marked the league's return after a 22-year absence. The network needed a studio honoring that legacy while serving multiple properties — NBA, NCAA Football, NCAA Basketball, and Olympics.
approach: Mystic fabricated an LED-dominated architecture with four floor-to-ceiling bands, reconfigurable tracking screens, and a signature etched glass logo wall with 30 NBA team panels. The 7,000 sq ft space includes a demo half-court with floor LED and regulation hoop.
result: Studio 1 launched with 'NBA Showtime' in November 2025, earning positive reviews for blending nostalgia with modern production innovation.

testimonial.quote: From day one, we knew we wanted to put a large emphasis on the studio. The studio has sort of become its own character.
testimonial.author: Jared Sumner
testimonial.title: Director, Studio Production
